mapper.select: select A.SIGNUP_ID, A.ACTIVITY_ID, A.COLLEGE_ID, A.IF_CHECK_IN, A.SIGNUP_DATE, B.COLLEGE_NAME, B.COLLEGE_AREA, B.COLLEGE_GROUP, B.COLLEGE_GENDER, B.COLLEGE_BIRTHDAY, B.COLLEGE_SCHOOL_GRADE, B.COLLEGE_PHONE, B.COLLEGE_TEL, B.COLLEGE_GRADE, B.COLLEGE_LEADER from camp_activity_signup A left join college_people B on A.COLLEGE_ID = B.COLLEGE_ID where A.ACTIVITY_ID = #{activityId} order by B.COLLEGE_AREA ASC
mapper.insert: insert into college_camp_check_in ( CHECK_IN_ID, COLLEGE_ID, CHECK_IN_TIME, CHECK_IN_LAST_TIME, IF_CHECK_IN, CAMP_DATE, ACTIVITY_ID, CHECK_TYPE_TIME, CHECK_INFO ) values (#{checkInId}, #{collegeId}, #{checkInTime}, #{checkInLastTime}, 'Y', #{campDate}, #{activityId}, #{checkTypeTime}, #{checkInfo} )
mapper.select: select A.SIGNUP_ID , A.ACTIVITY_ID, A.COLLEGE_ID, A.IF_CHECK_IN, A.SIGNUP_DATE, B.ACTIVITY_NAME, C.COLLEGE_NAME from camp_activity_signup A left JOIN camp_activity B on A.ACTIVITY_ID = B.ACTIVITY_ID left JOIN college_people C on A.COLLEGE_ID = C.COLLEGE_ID ORDER BY A.SIGNUP_DATE DESC
